user_instruction: 'Please craft a response to Mark'"'"'s email (mark@baxterassociates.com) with some guidance on the procedural matter. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Assistance Needed – Materials for Replying to Mark (Baxter & Associates)

Hi [Name/Team],

I’m putting together a response to Mark’s recent email regarding the procedural issue he’s facing. To make sure my guidance is complete and accurate, could you please gather the following for me?

1. Gmail  
   • The full email thread from Mark (mark@baxterassociates.com), including any attachments or referenced documents.  
   • Any prior correspondence with Mark on similar matters, if available.

2. Notion  
   • Pages, notes, or templates that cover comparable procedural workflows (e.g., filing deadlines, discovery schedules, or motion practice checklists).  
   • Any case-specific “lessons learned” or best-practice summaries that might be relevant.

If anything is calendar-related (e.g., upcoming filing dates or internal review deadlines), feel free to flag those as well.

Please let me know once the materials are collected or if you need any clarification. Your prompt help will allow me to draft a substantive response today.

Thank you!

Best,  
Jane
